body_html:
LD_LIBRARY_PATH is redacted by Bazel. The documentation is wrong there.

A hackish workaround is too edit tools/test/test-setup.sh to set LD_LIBRARY_PATH correctly in the Bazel source.

Fixing the relpath with C++ auto-configuration should do the long-term fix.
body_text:
LD_LIBRARY_PATH is redacted by Bazel. The documentation is wrong there.
A hackish workaround is too edit tools/test/test-setup.sh to set LD_LIBRARY_PATH correctly in the Bazel source.
Fixing the relpath with C++ auto-configuration should do the long-term fix.
body:
`LD_LIBRARY_PATH` is redacted by Bazel. The documentation is wrong there.

A hackish workaround is too edit tools/test/test-setup.sh to set LD_LIBRARY_PATH correctly in the Bazel source.

Fixing the relpath with C++ auto-configuration should do the long-term fix.
